attributes.action: Recognizing Transgender Men as Men and Transgender Women as Women.
attributes.background: We urge you to recognize and affirm that transgender men are men and transgender women are women, ensuring that all individuals are treated with respect and dignity, and that their gender identity is acknowledged in all legal and social contexts.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for similar action:

Amend Equality Act to define the terms woman and man not based on biological sex
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/725223
